title: Public About/Onboarding section and DMC Technologies attribution

requirements.summary: Add a public About/Onboarding view that explains DM Networks, how to sign in and use profiles/chat, and includes DMC Technologies attribution with external link.
acceptanceCriteria: When signed out, users can access an About/Onboarding view/section from the main UI (e.g., header or footer) without being blocked by AuthGate.
The About/Onboarding content is written in English and explains: what the app is, how to sign in, that profiles are used for display names, and that chat messages are visible to authenticated users.

The About/Onboarding content includes a visible attribution line stating the project is managed by DMC Technologies and includes a working external link to https://www.dmc-technologies.fr (opens in a new tab with rel="noopener noreferrer").

file_operations.description: Create a public About/Onboarding page (not wrapped by AuthGate) describing: what DM Networks is, how to sign in with Internet Identity, how profiles provide display names, and how to participate in the live chat; include a clear attribution line “Managed by DMC Technologies” with an external link to https://www.dmc-technologies.fr that opens in a new tab and uses rel="noopener noreferrer". Use shadcn-ui composed components (e.g., Card, Separator, Typography patterns) for consistent styling. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Wire the new About/Onboarding view into the main UI so it is reachable when signed out: extend the view state to include an “About” option, add a header (and optionally footer) navigation control that is always visible (not gated by authentication), and render AboutPage when selected. Ensure About is accessible without triggering AuthGate while existing Chat/Profile behavior remains unchanged.

requirements.summary: Update the global footer to consistently show “Managed by DMC Technologies” attribution while preserving existing branding links.
acceptanceCriteria: The footer displays an English attribution mentioning “Managed by DMC Technologies” and links to https://www.dmc-technologies.fr.
Existing footer content (e.g., the caffeine.ai link) remains present unless it conflicts visually; any changes still keep the footer coherent and readable on mobile and desktop.

file_operations.description: Update the global footer layout to include a persistent, readable attribution line “Managed by DMC Technologies” linking to https://www.dmc-technologies.fr (new tab + rel="noopener noreferrer"), while keeping the existing caffeine.ai link and overall footer coherence across mobile and desktop (e.g., stacked lines or responsive flex wrapping).
